snippet: A bloody corpse was found in a Bronx house.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column; unidentified elderly Bronx landlady, who rents out an apartment in her family home, gets the gruesome news that disturbing and prolonged hammering coming from the upstairs unit was apparently the sound of tenant George Lewis being set upon and murdered by unknown assailants.
lead_paragraph: A bloody corpse was found in a Bronx house.

headline.seo: A Bloody Body in a Bronx House
headline.main: A New Tenant, a Ruckus and a Corpse on the Stairs
headline.print_headline: A New Tenant, A Ruckus And a Corpse On the Stairs
